title: THE BAUERs Red Carpet Experience
text:
THE BAUERs Red Carpet Experience THE BAUERs Red Carpet Experience Details   15:30 Venice Film Festival 2015 The BAUERs, Venice has announced their Red Carpet Experience in light of the upcoming Venice Film Festival 2015. From 2nd until 12th September, Venice will be transformed into a star-studded city of canals, as the world’s most esteemed actors, producers and directors head to the UNESCO world herritage site for the 72nd Annual Venice Film Festival. 
The indulgent cinematic experience will whisk away film fanatics from The BAUERs Il Palazzo located on Venice’s San Marco and transport them across the lagoon in style by private water taxi to the Film Festival’s glitz and glamour on Venice Lido. Mingling amongst the stars, guests will make their way down the iconic ritzy red carpert before taking their seats at a screening of their choice, where films star the likes of Johnny Depp, Kristen Stewart, Eddie Redmayne and Ralph Feinnes. Following the exclusive Film Festival screening, a private water taxi will await the guests to cross the Venetian Lagoon for dinner at De Pisis restaurant. Guests can expect to dine on dishes with a delectable mediterranean three-course tasting menu whilst seated on the exquisite terrace, overlooking the architectural splendour of Venice from across the Grand Canal. The Red Carpet Experience concludes with a night in a Deluxe Room at the iconic five-star hotel, BAUERs Il Palazzo. THE BAUERs Red Carpet Experience from €545 per person, based on 2 people sharing 1 Deluxe Room at The BAUERs Il Palazzo for 1 night. The package includes transport to and from the hotel to the film festival, tickets to a film premier of the guests’ choice (subject to availability) as well as dinner at De Pisis Restaurant.
